name: MEMessage
desc: An object that contains information about a mail message, such as the subject, addressees, date sent, and the message contents.

items.name: var toAddresses: [MEEmailAddress]
items.desc: An array of email addresses for the primary recipients of the message.

items.name: var ccAddresses: [MEEmailAddress]
items.desc: An array of email addresses for the secondary recipients of the message.

items.name: var bccAddresses: [MEEmailAddress]
items.desc: An array of email addresses for the concealed tertiary recipients of the message.

items.name: var replyToAddresses: [MEEmailAddress]
items.desc: An array of email addresses to use when replying to the message.

items.name: var allRecipientAddresses: [MEEmailAddress]
items.desc: An array of email addresses for all recipients of the message.

items.name: var headers: [String : [String]]?
items.desc: A dictionary that contains the message’s header values.

items.name: var rawData: Data?
items.desc: The raw RFC 2822 header and body content of the message.

items.name: var state: MEMessageState
items.desc: The state of the mail message.
